content:
1. Sound of PPE (bunny suit and gloves) movement for PPE overview
2. Sound of wafer movement for shrink down and see it section
3. Sound of atoms and molecules interacting for shrink down and see it section
4. Sound of vacuum pumps and other equipment for PVD process section
5. Sound effects for different types of PVD techniques for PVD process section
6. Sound of cleanroom environment for PPE overview
7. Confirmation sound effects for user interactions
8. Sound effects for the quiz in the conclusion section
9. Sound effects for additional resources such as brochures, videos, and FAQs in the conclusion section
10. Voiceover Sound effects for the virtual instructor Simon
